section.name: Document actions menu
section.span: The document actions menu is a menu of actions that can be performed on a specific document.
section.p: You find the document actions menu in the review mode of a document, at the top.
In the document actions menu you can select Show referring documents to get a list of all documents referring to the current document.
Editors have access to much more document actions: renaming, copying, moving and deleting a document.

Although deleting a document is a document action to an editor, requesting deletion of a document is not a document action, but a miscellaneous action. You can find that menu also in the review mode of the document.

ul.li: If you are doing the tour, use the back button of your browser to continue. (There is no hyperlink here, because you can get here from many different pages.)
